SEARCH
Package com.nathcat.peoplecat_server

Class WebSocketAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.nathcat.peoplecat_server.WebSocketAdapter
public class WebSocketAdapter extends Object
Deprecated.
Handling of websockets to be handed off to new library
This is a utility class which allows the server to handle websocket connections for web based implementations of the PeopleCat platform.
Author:
Nathan Baines

    • detectWebSocket

      public static boolean detectWebSocket(Socket socket) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      Detect whether a TCP socket has a web socket client or not.
      Parameters:
      socket - The TCP socket
      Returns:
      True if the client is a websocket, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown when an I/O operation fails

    • createMessageBuffer

      public static byte[] createMessageBuffer(Packet packet)
      Deprecated.
      Transform a packet into a websocket fragment message buffer.
      Parameters:
      packet - The packet to transform
      Returns:
      A byte array containing the fragment data to be sent through the websocket.

    • readPacket

      public static Packet readPacket(InputStream in)
      Deprecated.
      Read a packet from a websocket input stream. This arrives in a fragment form so this is then transformed into a packet.
      Parameters:
      in - The input stream to read from
      Returns:
      The packet obtained from the input stream
